passwordpolicy_test.comment: Set 'Enforce password history' to '24 or more password(s)'
Set 'Maximum password age' to '60 or fewer day(s)'
Set 'Minimum password age' to '1 or more day(s)'
Set 'Minimum password length' to '14 or more character(s)'
Set 'Password must meet complexity requirements' to 'Enabled'
Set 'Store passwords using reversible encryption' to 'Disabled'

lockoutpolicy_test.comment: Set 'Account lockout duration' to '15 or more minute(s)'
Set 'Account lockout threshold' to '10 or fewer invalid logon attempt(s)'
Ensure 'Account lockout threshold' is not '0 invalid logon attempt(s)'
Set 'Reset account lockout counter after' to '15 or more minute(s)'

accesstoken_test.comment: Set 'SeIncreaseQuotaPrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE'
Ensure 'SeRemoteInteractiveLogonRight' contains only 'Administrators, Remote Desktop Users'
Set 'SeCreateGlobalPrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE'
Set 'SeImpersonatePrivilege' to 'Administrators, LOCAL SERVICE, NETWORK SERVICE, SERVICE'
Ensure 'Log on as a service' is configured to 'Not Defined'

registry_test.comment: Ensure 'MaxDevicePasswordFailedAttempts' is less than or equal to 10
Set 'passwordexpirywarning' to less than or equal to 14
Set 'passwordexpirywarning' to greater than or equal to 5
Ensure 'ForceKeyProtection' is equals to '1' or higher

auditeventpolicysubcategories_test.comment: Ensure 'Audit Application Group Management' is set to 'Success and Failure'
Ensure 'Audit Computer Account Management' is set to 'Success and Failure'
Ensure 'Audit Other Logon/Logoff Events' is set to 'Success and Failure'
Ensure 'Audit Removable Storage' is set to 'Success and Failure'

registry_test.comment: Ensure 'PasswordLength' is greater than or equal to '15'
Ensure 'PasswordAgeDays' is less than or equal to '30'
Check that 'MSS: (EnableICMPRedirect) Allow ICMP redirects to override OSPF generated routes' is configured to 'Disabled'
Set 'ScreenSaverGracePeriod' to less than or equal to 5
Set 'Turn off Microsoft Peer-to-Peer Networking Services' to '1'
Ensure SBP-2 Device Installations are Blocked
Ensure 'EMET_Service' is configured to start automatically
Ensure '*\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe' is set to '+EAF+ eaf_modules:mozjs.dll;xul.dll'
Ensure '*\Windows Media Player\wmplayer.exe' is set to '-EAF -MandatoryASLR'
Ensure 'MaxIdleTime' is less than or equal to '900000'
Ensure 'MaxIdleTime' is less than or equal to '900000' not '0'
Ensure 'Allow Remote Shell Access' is equal to '0'
Set 'HKEY_USERS\&lt;SID&gt;\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Control Panel\Desktop:ScreenSaveTimeOut' to '900' or less not '0'

registry_object.comment: This registry key identifies the Windows ProductName
registry_object.name: ProductName

family_object.comment: This is the default family object. Only one family object should exist.
